title: Make Bed
description: Make your bed neatly with sheets and blankets properly arranged

title: Clean Room
description: Organize toys, books, and clothes. Vacuum the floor

title: Wash Dishes
description: Wash and dry all dishes after dinner

title: Take Out Trash
description: Empty all trash bins and take to the main bin outside

title: Water Plants
description: Water all indoor plants and check soil moisture

title: Fold Laundry
description: Fold and organize clean clothes from the dryer

title: Set Table
description: Set the dinner table with plates, utensils, and napkins

title: Clean Bathroom
description: Clean sink, mirror, and toilet. Mop the floor
